10000000000000010000000000000000    //LDREX r1 <- mem[0]
10000100000000000001100000000000	//STREX mem[0] <- r0 ,r3
10000100000000010001000000000000	//STREX mem[0] <- r1 ,r2
00100000100001001111111111111111	//ADDI  r4 = r4 + 1111111111111111
10001100000001000000000000000000    //LW    r4 <- mem[0]
11111100000000000000000000000000	//HLT
